txt.en: Search for signs of Cyneberg from the eastern peaks of the High Knolls
Cyneberg despairs; her hopes for Wildermore and finding Thrymm alive have dwindled at last...
You have realized with some alarm that you have not seen or heard from Cyneberg since venturing north, and decide it is time to search for her in the High Knolls.

'You have my thanks for your help, [placeholder]. I think we can make it from here.'

You are now able to search for Cyneberg, at last. Perhaps she will have given up on her search for Thrymm.

You should find her and return to GÃ¡rwig. There is not much hope for Wildermore, but perhaps its surviving people can still be saved.

'You found me, [placeholder]? I did not expect to be found by a friend.

'I have been looking and looking... everywhere. There are no signs of Thrymm, from the High Knolls to the Writhendowns.

'I only find Orcs, death, and winter chill. Wildermore is lost.'
Cyneberg is somewhere in the High Knolls.\n\nYou should search a peak in the eastern part of the High Knolls to see if signs of Cyneberg can be detected.
